title: Dettol Antibacterial All In One Disinfectant Spray, Crisp Linen, 300ml (6 x 300ml, Total 1.8L), Household Sanitizer, Hard Surfaces and Upholstery, No Wiping Required, Kills 99.9 Percent of Germs
features: Kills 99.9 percent of bacteria and viruses: As well as antibiotic MRSA, E.coli, Salmonella, Listeria, Streptococcus, influenza Type A H1N1, Rhinovirus, Rotavirus (enveloped viruses)
Suitable for: door handles, rubbish bins, toilet areas, kitchen surfaces, sinks, sofas, car seats, mattresses, pet beds, when used as directed
Disinfecting and antibacterial spray: Dettol disinfectant and antibacterial spray is optimum for fast and hygienic cleaning; non bleach, no taint
description: Product Description Dettol All In One Disinfectant Spray kills the following bacteria, viruses and fungi: bacteria and fungi: e. Coli, salmonella, listeria, staph; aureus, campylobacter, streptococcus, athlete's foot fungus, MRSA; viruses: influenza type a h1n1, rhinovirus (the leading cause of the common cold), rotavirus (the leading cause of the infectious diarrhoea in children), respiratory syncytial virus (RVS-the leading cause of lower respiratory infection in children), poliovirus type 1, adenovirus type 2, herpes simplex virus types 1 & 2, hepatitis a virus, and sars-cov-2 (COVID-19). Ingredients Per 100g contains 58g Ethanol, 0.1g Quaternary Ammonium Compounds, Benzyl-C12-18-Alkyldimethyl, Salts with 1,2-Benzisothiazol-3 (2H)-one 1,1-Dioxide (1:1) (ADBAS), Contains Disinfectant, Perfume
